source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic lightning storm over a highway at night. The long exposure captures the movement of cars, creating bright white and red light trails that stretch into the distance. The sky is filled with dark, turbulent clouds that are spectacularly illuminated by frequent, powerful flashes of lightning.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic lightning storm over a highway at night. The long exposure captures the movement of cars, creating bright white and red light trails that stretch into the distance. The sky is filled with dark, turbulent clouds that are spectacularly illuminated by frequent, powerful flashes of lightning.

generated_critique: The caption includes an introductory sentence ("This is a time-lapse video of...") and subjective adjectives ("dramatic," "spectacularly," "powerful"), which should be removed. The description focuses more on the static results of a long-exposure photograph (the light trails) rather than the primary motion occurring in the video, which is the lightning. The caption should be revised to prioritize the description of the lightning's action, as that is the main dynamic element. A more accurate description would focus on the lightning flashing across the sky, while briefly noting the continuous light trails on the highway as a static feature of the time-lapse.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: Bolts of lightning flash across a dark, cloudy sky over a highway at night. Below, the time-lapse shows continuous white and red light trails from vehicle traffic stretching toward the horizon.
